title: If there is no data for a series, it should display a friendly error message.
description: When creating a chart and setting the data definition, if a column is selected that does not have any data, there should be a friendly error message displayed to notify the user.
EB: When selecting a column without data for a series, a friendly error message should be displayed.
SR:
1. Create a chart and set the data definition.
2. Select a column without any data.
3. Observe the error message displayed.
